headline: Why Analysts See Packaging Corp’s Growth Story Evolving After Recent Upgrades and Acquisitions
summary: Packaging Corporation of America stock has recently seen its consensus analyst price target rise slightly, increasing from $216.11 to $218.70 per share. This modest increase comes amid renewed optimism about the company’s growth prospects, supported by recent acquisitions and favorable supply-side shifts.
